item.description:
I recently tried the Trattoria after having it on my To Do list for a few years: I'm pleased to say that it was worth the wait. The food was very well done; the building, sharing a parking lot with Village Gardens Nursery, is more attractive than many, and the service was polished.

Yet another Italian restaurant on the South Shore is hardly news, but this one is worth knowing about.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Trattoria San Pietro
Village Gardens
376 Washington Street
Norwell, MA 02061
(781) 659-2009

Website: Trattoria San Pietro

Reviews on Yelp: Trattoria San Pietro

Organizer: Mike

Guests: Yes. Two per member allowed. For questions about exceptions, please contact Mike.

Price Range: Trattoria San Pietro LOOKS like it's expensive, but check the online menu - about half of the entrees are under $20,00.

Event Fee: Current Annual Members - None, Group Members - $2.00, Guests - $2.00; $12 to become a 2011 Annual Member 

Cash Only Policy: Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for over four years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps to keep things simpler for everyone.

RSVP Deadline: Tuesday, March 29th @ 7:00 pm. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by the Event Organizer. Changes to "No" after the deadline will be considered No-Shows per our guidelines on the About Us Pages.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions: Trattoria San Pietro is located on Washington St (Route 53) in Norwell, just alittle north of the Norwell - Hanover line. It shares a parking lot with Village Gardens Nursery.
item.how_to_find_us: Our reservation is under both 'Mike' and 'South Shore Meetup Group'.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Trattoria San Pietro
